website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice if you need an affordable bedside sleeper that doesn't skimp on quality.
pros: We love the 5-position adjustability and inward-facing legs that allow you to completely line the bassinet up with your mattress, so there's no dangerous gap
The sides are well-ventilated and you can use this as a regular bassinet or bedside co-sleeper
cons: A small number of buyers complain it doesn't feel sturdy enough, but this could be due to assembly errors

customer_reviews.title: Cute and stylish basinet
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product. It is perfect for next to my bed so I cane easily reach over and help my baby out. I love the color and the star print on the inside too. This was my most favorite product I bought for my baby. I highly recommend getting one. Was so worth the money and they are so spacious that my baby loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Katie M.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the wheels on just one side of the bassinet. It is very uncomfortable to move it around the house.
customer_reviews.author: elena

customer_reviews.title: Simple assembly, nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: If you can figure out how to work your dishwasher then you'll have no problem assembling this. It's very simple and takes all of 3 minutes. Nice looking product and functions well. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew W.

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: I get to sleep face to face with my baby girl while I’m in bed
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Cute, not so easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Baby's not due until September so I can't comment on sleep quality yet. Assembly was pretty difficult husband and I had a hard time as it seemed like some of the parts didn't fit well and we almost couldn't break it down after that. It came packed in the travel bag with what felt like a million zip ties to keep it compact, and because of this, when we tried to pack it back into the track bag, we couldn't compact it enough to get it zipped all the way. Other than the assembly I'm happy with the purchase and can't wait to use it for baby girl.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Wingate

customer_reviews.title: My baby LOVES THIS BED!!!
customer_reviews.text: My girl sleeps all night in this bed. We can lay face to face which allows us both to sleep!!! There is a mattress protector, thank God! First night we had a leaky diaper!!!
customer_reviews.author: TAMESA

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for my baby.
customer_reviews.text: It looked great but I was afraid of how rickety it was. I wondered if maybe I got a bad one but no time to return and wait to try out a new one so I returned it with no hassles.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie L. Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: GROSSED out and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Grossed out and disappointed.. There is blood or something of that sort on the bassinet right out of the package, parts where thrown in together.. I am pretty certain we got a used one. SUPER UPSET ABOUT THIS. I qm returning immediately sadly. It is a cute bassinet somewhat wobbly but still pretty sturdy. Extremely cute color... So grossed out to find blood smears on it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this bassinet! We started our son off in a bassinet that was attached to our pack n play and I didn't care for how bulky it was next to our bed. We decided to get this one because o liked tbhe fact that I could have him close and also have the ability to do down the side. I was pleased to when it came at how large it actually was bit convenient topic next to our bed! We will get more use out of it then others we looked at getting! Plus the mint color is gorgeous!
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t expect support
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough product, bad customer service. Lady at the end of the phone number just tells you to go to the website and fill out a form which is a bit of a process getting all the info/proof of purchase etc. Then the submit button doesn’t work and there’s a note saying “if you can’t submit, download the form and email” but it wouldn’t let me download either. There’s a nearly identical one at BuyBuyBaby for $20 more (after the ever present 20% off coupon) - Evolur stellar bedside. Think I’ll give that a try instead
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Visually nice, but not as high quality as I thought
customer_reviews.text: My baby isn’t here yet, but it’s looking like it’ll be great for her. Much more spacious then I thought, the actual bassinet bed and fabrics isn’t as nice as I thought it would be for the price it was but it’ll do the job. Hopefully it doesn’t get worn out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a small room and travel
customer_reviews.text: We love this bassinet. Our daughter sleeps comfortably in it and it pulls up to my side of the bed easily. We also traveled with it once and it worked perfectly! I’ve recommended this bassinet to a couple of my expecting friends already
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Way too low
customer_reviews.text: It would have been nice if it sat a little higher. It is really low, every ay the highest level. I’m this is pretty much for a platform bed.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Frias

customer_reviews.title: Hard to move
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet is hard to move. You have to tilt the bassinet to move and not smooth or safe when the baby is in the bassinet. I feel you should buy a 4-wheels bassinet rather than this strange 2-wheels one
customer_reviews.author: OKT

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful bassinet for my newborn baby girl. Very stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bonnell

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COSLEEPER
customer_reviews.text: My mom got this for me as a gift for my son and I love it. It lets my son sleep next to me while his dad and I still have all of our bed!
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: *****DANGEROUS- DO NOT BUY*****
customer_reviews.text: Product is not level! Our son has used it 3 times(five days old). He obviously can't roll over or move himself, yet we keep finding him against the side of the bassinet. I followed the directions exactly and even disassembled and reassembled the product and it is still no level. I even removed the "mattress" and put the level on it and it still was not level. I checked our floor and that is level. So it's definitely the product. Not safe, do not buy! We're returning it.
customer_reviews.author: john edwards

customer_reviews.title: False advertising!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my third baby. I had used a standard cheap bassinet for the other two. This time I was looking for a bassinet that didn't require me bending over to reach down and pick up the baby while in bed. This had hurt my back and knees over time with my other two. This listing states: "accommodates all types of beds leaving no gaps and is also easy on your back."in regards to height. I have a standard metal bed frame, box spring and mattress. There was still a 10-in gap between my mattress and the baby's mattress when on the tallest setting! Also worth noting that there are only wheels on two, so those do absolutely nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Hinson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this for my grandson. The value for money is spot on
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Burkhart

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Great bassinet for the price. I would recommend buying a spare sheet or two. And possibly spare padding.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Butler

customer_reviews.title: Easy not having the Baby in bed❣
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my Grandbaby, and my daughter in law was so thankful, said it was so helpful and worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Smiles

customer_reviews.title: So far, so perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We just recieved this bassinet so we havent quite used it yet, but so far its perfect! We have our bed and box spring on the floor so we needed a bassinet that had legs that did not need to go under the bed, could change the level to match our beds heighth, and had a side that went down for easy access/ simulated co-sleeping. Only complaint is that the front legs that fold in to get closer to the bed seem to be spring loaded. So you cant lock them back. Its not super bad, just somewhat annoying. Absolutelt LOVE the green color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Salgado

customer_reviews.title: so wobbly!!!
customer_reviews.text: i loved the thought of this bassinet and it is very cute but two things when assembling that made me return it. 1) it’s hard to assemble, it only comes in like 4 pieces but the pieces don’t fit into eachother smoothly you have to force them. 2) once it’s assembled it’s SO WOBBLY. it’s unsafe because it rocks side to side if anyone touches it. and i have a 2 yr old who would easily be able to knock this thing over. so, i say not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

product_meta.title: Dream On Me, Skylar Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper, Mint
product_meta.description: Color:MintThoughtfully built, the Skylar Bassinet & Bedside Sleeper is ideal for the first few months of parenthood.Weighing a little under 19 pounds, the Skylar is lightweight and mobile - wheel the bassinet around so your baby is always near you. Use it as a bedside sleeper - the legs fold inward, getting it close to the mattress. The sturdy strap system allows you to easily secure the Skylar to your bed frame. The mesh sides, which can be zipped down, allow easy viewing of your baby and ensure full breathability. Lean in for breastfeeding or comforting your child through a restless night! The five-adjustable height mechanism (13-17.3″) accommodates all types of beds leaving no gaps and is also easy on your back.Set-up is quick, thanks to a tool-free assembly. The Skylar is available with aluminum frames. It comes in five colors, allowing it to blend in beautifully with your nursery! The Skylar meets all ASTM standards. It comes with the regulatory 1-inch mattress pad (32.5Lx19.5Wx1H inches) and is recommended for babies up to 25 lbs or 6 months of age. Bassinet dimensions are 35.5Lx22Wx27H inches.
feature_bullets: KEEP BABY CLOSE BY: The Skylar is lightweight and mobile - wheel it around so your baby is always near. As a bedside sleeper, the legs fold inward, getting it close to the mattress. The mesh sides allow easy viewing of your baby and ensure full breathability

DUAL USE: Unzip and roll down the mesh sides to convert the bassinet into a bedside sleeper. Lean in for breastfeeding or comforting your child! Five adjustable heights (13-17.3") accommodate all types of beds leaving no gaps and is also easy on your back

SAFETY FIRST: The Skylar is designed with your child’s safety in mind and meets all ASTM standards. It comes with the regulatory 1-inch mattress pad (32.5Lx19.5Wx1H inches). Recommended for babies up to 25 lbs or 6 months of age

CONVENIENT FEATURES: Enjoy a quick tool-free assembly. The sturdy strap system allows you to easily secure the bassinet to your bed frame. It can be used as a portable bassinet, making it ideal for small spaces
STYLISH DESIGN: The Skylar is available with aluminum frames. It comes in five colors, allowing it to blend beautifully with your nursery! Bassinet dimensions are 35.5Lx22Wx27H inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars101 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
